text: @GovernorPataki @NYGovCuomo Governor, I respectfully want to inform you that NYC was attacked by CoVID-19 before POTUS's fateful downplay of its W. Coast entry by flights from China. NYC's invasion came via Europe/points East. No Fed action/alert to Jan-Feb/20 PDBs virus warnings enabled NY pandemic growth.
